scripts.update:all: npm run update:backend && npm run update:frontend && npm run update:api-gateway
scripts.build:frontend: tsc --build frontend && vite build --config frontend/vite.config.ts --root frontend
scripts.build-all: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=api-gateway && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start-backend" "npm run start-gateway" "npm run start-frontend"
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules api-gateway/node_modules package-lock.json
